properties.name: Key
properties.description: Specifies the name of a field for a particular object. To view valid values for a particular field, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

type.description: Specifies the name of a field for a particular object. To view valid values for a particular field, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

properties.name: RefValue
properties.description: A field value that you specify as an identifier of another object in the same pipeline definition.

type.description: A field value that you specify as an identifier of another object in the same pipeline definition.

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: A field value that you specify as a string. To view valid values for a particular field, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

type.description: A field value that you specify as a string. To view valid values for a particular field, see Pipeline Object Reference in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The field identifier.

type.description: The field identifier.

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

type.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

properties.name: Attributes
properties.description: The attributes of the parameter object.

type.description: The attributes of the parameter object.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The ID of the parameter object.

type.description: The ID of the parameter object.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The ID of the parameter value.

type.description: The ID of the parameter value.

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

type.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

properties.name: Fields
properties.description: Key-value pairs that define the properties of the object.

type.description: Key-value pairs that define the properties of the object.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The ID of the object.

type.description: The ID of the object.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the object.

type.description: The name of the object.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of a tag.

type.description: The key name of a tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value to associate with the key name.

type.description: The value to associate with the key name.

resource.description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

properties.name: Activate
properties.description: Indicates whether to validate and start the pipeline or stop an active pipeline. By default, the value is set to true.

type.description: Indicates whether to validate and start the pipeline or stop an active pipeline. By default, the value is set to true.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the pipeline.

type.description: A description of the pipeline.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the pipeline.

type.description: The name of the pipeline.

properties.name: ParameterObjects
properties.description: The parameter objects used with the pipeline.

type.description: The parameter objects used with the pipeline.

properties.name: ParameterValues
properties.description: The parameter values used with the pipeline.

type.description: The parameter values used with the pipeline.

properties.name: PipelineObjects
properties.description: The objects that define the pipeline. These objects overwrite the existing pipeline definition. Not all objects, fields, and values can be updated. For information about restrictions, see Editing Your Pipeline in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

type.description: The objects that define the pipeline. These objects overwrite the existing pipeline definition. Not all objects, fields, and values can be updated. For information about restrictions, see Editing Your Pipeline in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

properties.name: PipelineTags
properties.description: A list of arbitrary tags (key-value pairs) to associate with the pipeline, which you can use to control permissions. For more information, see Controlling Access to Pipelines and Resources in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

type.description: A list of arbitrary tags (key-value pairs) to associate with the pipeline, which you can use to control permissions. For more information, see Controlling Access to Pipelines and Resources in the AWS Data Pipeline Developer Guide.

attributes.description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.
